lines.text: declare integer variables n , i , m , cnt , mn , x , k and j with mn = 1e9 and an array of integers arr with size 105
lines.code: int n , i , m , cnt , mn = 1e9 , arr [ 105 ] , x , k , j ;

lines.text: read arr [ i ] in a loop while i < n
lines.code: for ( cin >> n ; i < n ; i ++ ) cin >> arr [ i ] ;

lines.text: for j = 0 to arr [ i ] exclusive , read x and increase cnt by x * 5 + 15
lines.code: for ( j = 0 ; j < arr [ i ] ; j ++ ) cin >> x , cnt += x * 5 + 15 ;

lines.text: assign value of min of mn and cnt to mn
